metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35653 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Pillow before 8.1.0, PcxDecode has a buffer over-read when decoding acrafted PCX file because the user-supplied stride value is trusted forbuffer calculations.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-35653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-imaging - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.5
python-pil - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.5
python-pil.imagetk - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.5
python3-pil - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.5
python3-pil.imagetk - 3.1.2-0ubuntu1.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-0ubuntu1.5').
